text: Jandiala Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 14) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Amritsar district, Punjab state, India. ==Member of Legislative Assembly== * 2012: Baljit Singh Jalal Usma, Shiromani Akali Dal * 2017: Sukhwinder Singh Danny Bandala, Indian National Congress ==Election results== ===2017=== ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Amritsar district
title: Jandiala Assembly Constituency
